name: Conch Tour Train
description: As a legacy to Henry Flagler’s “railway over the sea” the Conch Tour Train has treated visitors to an in-depth view of the city’s most charming, historic and interesting attractions for 50 years...and counting. The Conch Tour Train took its inaugural ride in 1958 and has been offering tours throughout Key West ever since.  For a historic adventure through Key West, take a ride on board Key West's original sightseeing tour, the Conch Tour Train.
about: As a legacy to Henry Flagler’s “railway over the sea” the Conch Tour Train has treated visitors to an in-depth view of the city’s most charming, historic and interesting attractions for 50 years...and counting. The Conch Tour Train took its inaugural ride in 1958 and has been offering tours throughout Key West ever since.  For a historic adventure through Key West, take a ride on board Key West's original sightseeing tour, the Conch Tour Train.
